com.interpss.dc.algo

Interface DcPowerFlowAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PVDcPowerFlowAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DcPowerFlowAlgorithmImpl, PVDcPowerFlowAlgorithmImpl

    public interface DcPowerFlowAlgorithm
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'Dc System Algorithm'. Dc system Loadflow algorithm implementation.

    The following features are supported:

    • Data Check Config
    • Method
    • Max Iterations
    • Tolerance
    • Init Bus Voltage
    See Also:
    DcSysAlgorithmPackage.getDcPowerFlowAlgorithm()

      • getMethod

        DcPowerFlowMethod getMethod()
        Returns the value of the 'Method' attribute. The default value is "NR". The literals are from the enumeration DcPowerFlowMethod.

        If the meaning of the 'Method' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Method' attribute.

      • isInitBusVoltage

        boolean isInitBusVoltage()
        Returns the value of the 'Init Bus Voltage' attribute. The default value is "true".

        If the meaning of the 'Init Bus Voltage' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        If set to true, Dc bus voltge will be init to 1.0 before loadflow calculation
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Init Bus Voltage' attribute.
        See Also:
        setInitBusVoltage(boolean), DcSysAlgorithmPackage.getDcPowerFlowAlgorithm_InitBusVoltage()
